sections.subtitle: The Beginning
sections.content: I'm not the typical developer. A long time ago, my journey began — over 20 years ago — as a young padawan discovering the early powers of visuals, motion, and detail. That's where the first skills took shape: pixel-perfect layouts, smooth interactions, and interfaces that felt alive.

sections.subtitle: The Evolution
sections.content: But style alone wasn't enough. The real power came when I embraced the other side of the stack — solving complex challenges, building integrations, and connecting systems. Some might call it the dark side of development. I call it balance.

sections.subtitle: The Present
sections.content: Today, I'm walking the path of product design — adding strategy and UX thinking to my toolkit, aiming to understand not just how to build, but what to build and why.

sections.subtitle: The Mission
sections.content: I create to solve. For clients. For users. For the products I believe in. My focus is on helping digital products grow with clarity — and shaping the tools I'd want to use myself.

sections.subtitle: The Learning
sections.content: A developer's journey is never done. New tools, new mindsets, new challenges — I keep learning to stay sharp, adaptable, and ready for what's next.

sections.subtitle: The Vision
sections.content: Beyond code and design, I believe in building things that last — products with purpose, interfaces that matter, and ideas that evolve into something real.

sections.subtitle: The Future
sections.content: Ideas become products. Side-projects become platforms. I'm building tools to help others — and to power my own vision.
sections.additional: Always curious. Always building. Always delivering.
